column4: upgrading from 6.06 to 6.10... should I expect a clean upgrade generally ... or do most people do clean installations? I have my root in its own partition.
I've upgraded from hoary->breezy->dapper->edgy without (many) problems
it also depends on your experience level I guess - ie. what counts as 'a problem' for you...
that's very true ... I have no problem reconfiguring things .. I just hope I don't fun into high level problems that are beyond me :)
